Please check the following： 1.Please confirm the correct Wi-Fi name and password 2.Please ensure the device into the pairing mode 3.Please ensure the device is covered by Wi-Fi signa 4.Please ensure your mobile connecting to the 2.4GHz Wi-Fi Device Name： Device binding successfully Go to the next step in 3s User name Please enter the user name Gender Birthday MAC Address SN Model Version Latest Please enter the device name Water-saving Mode LED on start LED off start LED off end Device Group Plant Name Please enter the plant name Growth Cycle Custom Group Complete Search loacation nearby Location is invisible Original password Please enter original password New password Please enter new password Please enter the password again Planting Mode Change plant name, go to previous page, Click to clear planting data Record the detail of the plant every day QR Code Scan the QR code Photo Album Flashlight Device Setting Plant Setting Alert Device Information Clear planting data Quick Guide Terms of service Version Shop Write down your feeling at this moment Please choose the photo Add device, build your smart gardens anywhere Lighting Refresh Setting Upgrade Recycle Firmware picture description Device Firmware Upgrade Add a group Enter group name Default Group Group Management Take Photos Choose from photo album Cancel Placement Share to Man Woman Keep secret How to set into pairing status Choose the state button Confirm Do you want to delete the group？ New version available, confirm to upgrade？ Upgrade failed Stop Upgrade successfully Version update Update now Exit Update later Update wisgrow Delete Choose the device No response to the device binding Connecting Device Turn on LED successfully Failed to turn on LED, and please try again later Turn off LED successfully Failed to turn off LED, and please try again later Deletion will restore the device to factory setting，please confirm New firmware detected,would you like to upgrade? The photo album needs to get access to storage permission ,please set it in "Setting-Application-Permission " Setting failed Water saving mode can not be opened as the planting setting is not complete Opening time canot be among the blackout time Please choose the right time Blackout time cannot exceed %d hours Setting failed The device has no response, and fail to start the water-saving mode Fail to get the parameters, and fail to start the water-saving mode Please enter the right mobile number The program can not be used without permission Parameters are wrong Unknown error Fail to parse the QR code Add plant No more //暂无数据 No data The password must be more than 8 bits Product series are empty Binding… This device has been binded Edit the group %s devices have been added //生长周期不能id为空 Device ID can not be empty in growing period //植物不能为空 Plant ID can not be empty Plant Growth Cycle can not be empty Press it again to exit Please open the floating window permission of Wisgrow APP Year Month Day Planting Records Edit No device in planting Update the date: The local address is inaccessible Please open camera permission Photo and text cannot be empty at the same time Plug in and make sure the device is pairing mode The indicator is flashing The device bind exception.
